description: Try this creamy pasta recipe that's packed with veggies. This easy traybake is from Woolworths team member Sara Kata from the Victoria Park store.
keywords: Pasta,Seafood free,Soy free,Tree nut free,Winter,Sesame free,Spinach,Mushroom,Peanut free
name: Mushroom & Green Veggie Primavera Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Cook pasta in saucepan of boiling, salted water according to packet instructions. Drain. Transfer to a large round baking dish.
Meanwhile, heat oil in a large deep frying pan over medium heat. Cook garlic and onion, stirring, for 5 minutes or until onion softens. Add broccoli, mushrooms, beans and peas, then stir to combine.

Add stock, cream and 1 1/3 cups parmesan and bring to the boil over high heat. Reduce heat to medium and simmer, stirring, for 2 minutes or until cheese melts and sauce thickens slightly. Add sauce mixture and spinach to pasta and toss to coat. Sprinkle with mozzarella.
Bake for 20 minutes or until cheese is melted and golden. Serve topped with remaining parmesan.
